amendment.description: To improve the financial disclosure process under the Ethics in Government Act of 1978.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3823 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3823 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Voinovich. (consideration: CR S10025-10026; text: CR S10025-10026) To improve the financial disclosure process under the Ethics in Government Act of 1978.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3823 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Voinovich.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3823 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
